column1: Tweets
#Seamaster OMEGA in Mykonos. Immerse yourself in a mythical setting for a beautiful event, bathed in bold Summer Blue. http://omegawatches.com/PrecisionAtEveryLevel… #OMEGA

#Seamaster Precision at every level. 1200 metres. The Seamaster Ploprof crafted in O-MEGASTEEL, with a sun-brushed dial in OMEGA’s own Summer Blue, the iconic mono-bloc case, and a unique bezel ring in sapphire crystal. http://omegawatches.com/precision-at-every-level/ploprof-1200m… #OMEGA

#Seamaster Precision at every level. Discover the Seamaster in Summer Blue collection. OMEGA's 7-model celebration of the Seamaster family launched 75 years ago. http://omegawatches.com/PrecisionAtEveryLevel… #OMEGA
